title: Searching for good support coach
body: Hello guys, my name is adrian and ive been playing LoL since season 4 activly. My first role was mid,then top,jungle and now I would like to learn how to support. I play support for 3 months so I would need some more advanced tips from an active support player :) and yeah im lvl 30 but havnt played any ranked games yet thats why i need some help :D so if you wanna add me ingame ;D
